title: Kilimanjaro Lyrics Endhiran song lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Javed Ali, Chinmayi
Lyrics: P. Vijay

Aahak aahaa .... Aahak aahaa
Napriyaneyaa..Napriyaneyaa..
Napriyaneyaa..Napriyaneyaa..

Kilimanjaro mazhai-kani maanjaro
Kanna kuli maanjaro yaaro yaarao
Aahak aahaa  Aahak aahaa

Mohanjadharo unnil nulainjadhano
paiyan kolinjadharao yaaro yaaro
Aahak aahaa  Aahak aahaa

kaatuvaasi kaatuvasi pachaiyaga kadiya
Muthathaala vegavachi singapallil udaya
Aahak aahaa  Aahak aahaa

Malapaambu pola vandhu maakutaiya pudiya
Sokkum milagu thatti soupu vachi kudiya
Aahak aahaa  Aahak aahaa

Yevazhuku thangachiye enkudathaan irukka
aaluyara olive-pazham appadiye enakka

Akkakko adi kinnikozhi
Appappo enna pinnikodi
Ippappo mutham ennikkodi
Ippap ennikko nee
Kilimanjaro mazhai-kani maanjaro ...

Kodi pachaye elumichaye
unmel unmel uyir ichaye

Ada nooru kodi thasai
Ovvondrilum undhan pere isai

Inichakeere adichakkarai
Manasa renda madichikkera

Naan oora vaitha kani
Ennai mella aara vaithu kadi

Vervarai nuzhayum veyyulum naan
Nee ilaithirai yen ittai ?

Udhattayum udhattayum pootti kondu oru yugam
mudhithu thira anbaai

Akkakko adi kinnikozhi ..
Kilimanjaro mazhai-kani maanjaro ...

Sunai vaasiye suga vaasiye
Thol karuvi enai vaasiye

En thol kuthadha pala rekkai katti
kaal kondadum nila

Mara thegam naan maramkothi nee
Vanadesam naan adhil vaasam nee

Nooru gram thaan idai unakku ini
yaaru naan thaan udai

Ainthadi valarntha aattu sedi- enai
meindhu vidu motham

Pachai pasum pul neeyanaal
puli pul thinnume, enna kutham

Akkakko adi kinnikozhi
Appappo enna pinnikodi
Ippappo mutham ennikkodi
Ippap ennikko nee
Aahak aahaa  Aahak aahaa
Aahak aahaa  Aahak aahaa
Ippapp – ennikko nee
